short_description_localized.en: Now is the time to stay in one of our newly renovated suites with rates from $105 and 50% off our resort fee! Escape the winter blues this December and enjoy the wonderful Florida weather.

description_localized.en: Now is the time to stay in one of our newly renovated suites with rates from $105 and 50% off our resort fee! Escape the winter blues this December and enjoy the Florida weather.  Enjoy:

policy_localized.en: Terms & Conditions All reservations require a credit card guarantee at time of booking. 1 night penalty applies if not cancelled 72 hours prior to arrival. | Daily $16.95 (+tax) hotel fee will be added as a separate charge on your folio | We value your privacy and recognize its importance. View our full Privacy Policy" | Guarantee/Deposit and Change/Cancellation Fees will depend on selected dates and room/rate combination.

short_description_override_localized.en: Now is the time to stay in one of our newly renovated suites with rates from $105 and 50% off our resort fee! Escape the winter blues this December and enjoy the wonderful Florida weather.

policy_override_localized.en: Rate does not include the Hotel Fee of $16.95 per night, plus tax.

addons_override: $25 credit at The Vista Bistro - Italian Eatery (one-time)
50% off resort fee (valued at $8.47 plus tax, per day)
Plus, our daily signature hot breakfast buffet and parking are always FREE!
